pkgmetadata.longdescription: Carbonizer============A Python CLI to create carbonized versions of your code. This projects is based on: Carbon_, Pyppetter_and the wonderful Typer_ Framework.Installation:-----------------.. code-block:: bash $ pip install carbonizerUsage-----------.. code-block:: bash carbonizer --help # This creates a carbonized version in the same directory carbonizer some_file.py # To create the output in a specific folder carbonizer -o target some_file.py # This will grab all files and carbonize them carbonizer -o target . # The -c flag directly copied the output into your clipboard carbonizer -c some_file.py # If you prefer to run the raw code you can also use the project like python __main__.py -t "one-light" carbonizer -o targetNote: The copy functionality is only tested on Linux devices - while Mac is also supported theoretically, there is no support for windows... _Typer: https://typer.tiangolo.com/.. _Carbon: https://carbon.now.sh.. _Pyppetter: https://miyakogi.github.io/pyppeteer/index.html
